title: Lagging only on leaugue of legends
body:
Don't know if anything happened to my client or anything, but somehow raised to 150 ping after playing on 60 for the past year. Been staying like this for a couple days now and still don't know what to do.

Only league of legends has been lagging for me and everything else seems fine.

Any help would be appreciated, thank you

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Donjie,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oRO8qU9E,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-31T23:24:28.440+0000)
>
> Don&#039;t know if anything happened to my client or anything, but somehow raised to 150 ping after playing on 60 for the past year. Been staying like this for a couple days now and still don&#039;t know what to do.
> 
> Only league of legends has been lagging for me and everything else seems fine.
> 
> Any help would be appreciated, thank you

Download Ping Plotter and run a test, preferably at least 30 minutes to this IP address 104.160.131.3. Post results, community might be able to help you narrow down what could be wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=Naatsnumz,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oRO8qU9E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-01T01:11:02.232+0000)
>
> Download Ping Plotter and run a test, preferably at least 30 minutes to this IP address 104.160.131.3. Post results, community might be able to help you narrow down what could be wrong.

How would I go about posting the results on here? Just finished testing

You could be having a network problem like bad connection or trouble specifically staying connected to the game server causing an increase in ping.  I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
